name: Purpose: Retired
description:
'Purpose : Retired' is a short graphic adventure game about a retired police-man and father struggling to find purpose in the next chapter of his life.

What might happen when one average day he discovers a young boy stealing at the local market?

Careful! This game is a very short adventure and is designed to be finished in a single session and so has no save function!

Game by Ross McRitchie
Engine by Chris Jones
